name: Prevalence of STEM workers in select industries, by occupation group: 2021
description: Prevalence of STEM workers in select industries, by occupation group: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data include the employed, civilian, non-institutionalized population ages 16–75 and exclude those currently enrolled in primary or secondary school. Industries were selected if the percentage of S&E, S&E-related, or STEM-middle skill workers in that industry was at least 2.5 times the percentage of all U.S. workers in the indicated STEM group. In 2021, 24.2% of workers were in STEM occupations, 6.2% were in S&E occupations, 8.9% were in S&E-related occupations, and 9.1% were in STEM middle-skill occupations.
sources: Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS), 1-Year Public-Use File, 2021, data as of October 2022.Science and Engineering Indicators
